casebody.data:
Michael Nicholson et al. v. The Connecticut Half-Way House, Inc. Peter L. Costas, in support of the petition. Henry D. Marcus, on behalf of the appellees (plaintiffs), in opposition. Submitted October 20 decided November 30, 1965 Submitted November 8

decided November 30, 1965

The petition by Peter L. Costas for leave to file a brief and to argue before this court as amicus curiae in the appeal from the Court of Common Pleas in Hartford County is denied.

The petition by Belton A. Copp for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae in the appeal from the Court of Common Pleas in Hartford County is denied.
